A very popular Japanese TV quiz show called, "Sekai Fushigi 
Hakken"(Discovering the mysteries of the world) will feature Aizu colony in California in the 
next episode which will be aired 8 January.

According to the official site of the show,
http://www.tbs.co.jp/f-hakken/mystery_1.html
they'll talk about Schenel and Aizu people settled in US after Boshin war, 
especially young Japanese girl Okei. 

I remember sec mentioned about a team of Japanese TV coming to report about 
Aizu colony in California a while back.

Of course, I'll see the show hoping share more info.

Tama
